meta.title: Sora 2 AI Video Generator - No Watermark, No Invitation Code
meta.description: OpenAI's Sora 2 AI video generator: Create realistic videos from text or images. No watermark, no invite code, no app download. Text-to-video & image-to-video tool.

hero.title: Sora 2 AI Video Generator
hero.subtitle: No Watermark • No Invitation Code • No App Download
hero.description: Experience OpenAI's latest Sora 2 AI video generation model. Transform text descriptions or images into stunning, realistic videos with advanced motion effects and physics consistency. Perfect for creative projects and social media content - start generating professional videos instantly without any barriers.

features.title: Why Choose Our Sora 2 AI Video Generator
features.description: OpenAI's Sora 2 represents a breakthrough in AI video generation. Experience professional video creation with no watermarks, no invitation codes, and no app downloads required.

items.title: Advanced Physics Simulation & Realistic Motion
items.description: Sora 2 delivers unprecedented physical accuracy with realistic motion effects and physics consistency. Unlike previous video generators that distort reality, Sora 2 follows real-world physics laws - basketballs bounce naturally, surfers demonstrate proper buoyancy dynamics, and objects maintain visual consistency throughout complex sequences.

items.title: Dual-Mode Generation - Text to Video & Image to Video
items.description: Create videos from pure text prompts or transform static images into dynamic motion sequences. Sora 2 supports both text-to-video and image-to-video generation, allowing you to describe cinematic scenes or animate existing images with natural movement while maintaining visual coherence.

items.title: Flexible Output & Aspect Ratios for Any Platform
items.description: Generate videos up to 15 seconds in portrait or landscape formats, perfect for social media, mobile apps, and cinematic content. Sora 2 offers standard and high-definition rendering options, balancing speed with quality to meet diverse production needs from quick social posts to professional content creation.

items.title: Precise Creative Control & Style Versatility
items.description: Sora 2 provides fine-grained control over scenes, actions, and artistic styles. Generate realistic footage, cinematic sequences, or stylized animations with exceptional prompt adherence. The model excels across photorealistic, cinematic, and anime styles, executing complex multi-shot instructions while maintaining consistent world states.

how_to_use.title: How to Generate Videos with Sora 2 - Simple 3-Step Process
how_to_use.description: Create professional AI-generated videos with Sora 2 in minutes. Our intuitive interface makes video generation accessible to everyone.

items.title: Step 1: Choose Your Input Method
items.description: Select text-to-video mode to describe your scene with detailed prompts, or choose image-to-video mode to upload a reference image. Sora 2 API supports both methods, allowing you to describe camera movements, actions, and visual styles, or transform static images into natural motion sequences with maintained visual consistency.

items.title: Step 2: Configure Video Settings
items.description: Customize your output by selecting aspect ratio (portrait for social media or landscape for cinematic content), quality settings, and video duration up to 15 seconds. Sora 2 offers flexible configurations to balance rendering speed with video quality, adapting to different production requirements from quick social posts to professional projects.

items.title: Step 3: Generate and Download Your Video
items.description: Click generate and let Sora 2 process your request with advanced world simulation capabilities. The model will create your video with realistic physics, consistent object permanence, and precise adherence to your instructions. Preview the result and download your high-quality video ready for social media, creative projects, or commercial use.

faq.title: Sora 2 AI Video Generator - Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about using Sora 2 for professional video generation. Learn about features, capabilities, and best practices.

items.question: What is Sora 2 and how does it differ from other video generators?
items.answer: Sora 2 is OpenAI's latest AI video generation model that represents a major breakthrough in video AI technology. Unlike previous video generators that distort objects and bend reality, Sora 2 follows real-world physics laws with unprecedented accuracy. It can simulate complex scenarios like Olympic-level gymnastics, surfboard backflips with accurate buoyancy and rigidity dynamics, and natural object interactions. Sora 2 generates videos from text prompts or reference images with cinematic quality, realistic motion effects, and physics consistency.

items.question: What are the key features of Sora 2 video generation?
items.answer: Sora 2 offers several groundbreaking features: dual-mode generation (text-to-video and image-to-video), advanced physics simulation with realistic motion, flexible aspect ratios for portrait and landscape formats, high-definition output options up to 15 seconds in length, precise creative control over scenes and styles, and support for photorealistic, cinematic, and anime aesthetics. The model also features enhanced prompt adherence and can execute complex multi-shot instructions while maintaining consistent world states throughout the video.

items.question: How long does it take to generate videos with Sora 2?
items.answer: Generation time varies based on the model version and settings you choose. Sora 2 standard quality typically takes 3-5 minutes to generate. For Sora 2 Pro with HD quality: 10-second HD videos typically take 10-20 minutes to generate, and 15-second HD videos take around 30 minutes (this reflects OpenAI's native delivery speed). We strongly recommend using the 15-second HD option with caution, as it takes longer and may have minor imperfections. You can leave the page after submitting - completed videos will appear in your My Creations section.

items.question: Why do my video generations keep failing?
items.answer: Video generation failures typically occur due to content policy violations. OpenAI's safety systems will block requests that contain: realistic photos of identifiable people (to prevent deepfakes and misuse), sexually explicit content, graphic violence or gore, or other prohibited content. To ensure successful generation, avoid uploading realistic human face photos and refrain from using prompts that describe violent, explicit, or harmful content. If you believe your content is appropriate but still experiencing failures, try rephrasing your prompt or using different reference images.

items.question: How does Sora 2 handle physics and realism in generated videos?
items.answer: Sora 2 excels at physical accuracy and realism. When a basketball player misses a shot, the ball bounces off the backboard naturally instead of teleporting to the hoop like in older models. The system can simulate proper buoyancy, object permanence, gravity, and material properties. This physics consistency makes Sora 2 suitable for creating realistic training simulations, sports content, and professional creative projects that require authentic motion dynamics.

items.question: Can I use Sora 2 for social media and commercial content?
items.answer: Yes! Sora 2 is perfect for social media and commercial applications. The model generates videos up to 15 seconds long with flexible aspect ratios optimized for different platforms - portrait format for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts, or landscape for traditional video content. Videos generated with Sora 2 through our platform are suitable for commercial use in marketing, advertising, and content creation. The system produces high-quality output without watermarks, ready for immediate publishing.

items.question: What makes Sora 2 better at following prompts than earlier models?
items.answer: Sora 2 demonstrates significantly improved prompt adherence compared to earlier video generation models. It can execute complex, multi-part instructions across multiple shots while maintaining visual and narrative consistency. The model understands detailed descriptions of camera movements, character actions, scene transitions, and artistic styles. This enhanced controllability allows creators to achieve specific creative visions with precision, whether generating realistic documentary-style footage, cinematic sequences, or stylized animations.

items.question: How much does Sora 2 cost and how does the credit system work?
items.answer: Sora 2 uses a transparent credit-based pricing system. Each video generation consumes credits based on your selected settings such as resolution, aspect ratio, and video duration (up to 15 seconds maximum). Standard quality generations require fewer credits, while high-definition outputs use more. You can purchase credit packages that fit your production needs. No subscription required - only pay for what you generate. Check the workspace interface for current credit costs per generation.

examples.title: Sora 2 Video Generation Examples - See the Power in Action
examples.subtitle: Discover how Sora 2 transforms static images and text descriptions into stunning, realistic videos with advanced physics simulation and cinematic quality

image_to_video.title: Image to Video - Animate Your Photos
image_to_video.description: Upload any static image and watch Sora 2 bring it to life with natural motion, maintaining visual consistency and physical realism. Our image-to-video mode preserves the original aesthetics while adding smooth, dynamic movement that follows real-world physics.
image_to_video.input_image_alt: Example source image for Sora 2 image-to-video generation

text_to_video.title: Text to Video - From Words to Cinematic Scenes
text_to_video.description: Describe your vision in text and let Sora 2 generate professional-quality videos with precise adherence to your instructions. Our text-to-video mode understands complex prompts including camera movements, lighting, actions, and artistic styles to create exactly what you envision.
text_to_video.input_prompt: A dramatic Hollywood breakup scene at dusk on a quiet suburban street. A man and a woman in their 30s face each other, speaking softly but emotionally, lips syncing to breakup dialogue. Cinematic lighting, warm sunset tones, shallow depth of field, gentle breeze moving autumn leaves, realistic natural sound, no background music
